The World of Smog: On Her Majesty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Service
boardgame.description: Set in the fantastic steampunk The World of Smog created by Panache Animation, On Her Majesty's Service is a stylish board game for two to four competing players. You'll need to navigate the rotating tiles that make up the game board, trading Ethers and Artefacts in order to fulfill the quest set by Queen Victoria, all the while dealing with the Agents of the Shadow Master._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNSM001) Set in the fantastic steampunk World of Smog created by Panache Animation, On Her Majesty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Service is a stylish board game for two to four competing players. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to navigate the rotating tiles that make up the game board, trading Ethers and Artefacts in order to fulfill the quest set by Queen Victoria, all the while dealing with the Agents of the Shadow Master.
New in shrink.

[b]YOU ARE BUYING: THE WORLD OF SMOG: ON HER MAJESTY_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S SERVICE - KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE GENTLEMAN_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S PLEDGE + PLUS: EXCLUSIVE FULL BODY MINI_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S PACK ADD-ON! NEW/SEALED CONTENTS: KICKSTARTER GENTLEMAN PLEDGE BASE GAME:[/b] Game board with 12 rotating tiles 4 Gentleman dashboards 4 Gentleman figures 6 Agent figures 6 Agent cards 30 coin tokens 30 Hourglass tokens 16 Ether counters 1 First Player/Shadow Master token 24 Special Action cards 16 Artifact cards 8 Secret Gate cards 13 Secret Combination cards [b]EXCLUSIVES FROM THE KICKSTARTER GENTLEMAN PACK:[/b] Agent The Puppet Bust Sculpt Mini Agent The Mad Scientist Bust Sculpt Mini Agent The Comedian Bust Sculpt Mini Agent The Hybrid Bust Sculpt Mini Gentlemen Suzanne Taylor Bust Sculpt Mini Gentlemen Colonel Steel Bust Sculpt Mini Agent Cards for Gentlemen All Cards in Gold Exclusive Foil! [b]ALSO INCLUDES THIS ADD-ON FULL BODY GENTLEMAN MINIATURE FIGURES PACK LOOK LIKE THESE BEAUTIES (CHECK THE PICTURE)...[/b] [b]Game Overview:[/b] Set in the fantastic steampunk The World of Smog created by Panache Animation, On Her Majesty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Service is a stylish board game for two to four competing players. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to navigate the rotating tiles that make up the game board, trading Ethers and Artefacts in order to fulfill the quest set by Queen Victoria, all the while dealing with the Agents of the Shadow Master. Each player controls a different Gentleman, tasked by Queen Victoria to journey into the Shadow Market and bring her four precious Artefacts. To do so, they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to navigate the underworld of shifting gears that is the Shadow Market, buying and selling the different Ethers in order to have the Coins necessary to acquire all four of the Artefacts. One unique aspect of On Her Majesty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Service is that each player may only interact with the icons that are facing their edge of the board. Since the tiles that make up the board are frequently rotated by the players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; actions, the landscape of options available to each player is in constant change. Manipulating the board to one_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s advantage (and to hinder your opponents) is crucial to victory. [b]HAPPY SHOPPING!!! PLEASE CHECK OUT MY GEEKMARKET STORE WITH MORE AWESOME GAMES!!![/b]

Up for auction is my brand new Kickstarter copy of World of Smog. This includes all stretch goals, as well as 2 add-ons: - Full Body Gentleman Figures Minis - 24 Sculpted Ether Counters Shipping will be USPS Priority from 23060 to the US only. Let me know if you have any questions!

New in shrink Kickstarter edition. Kickstarter-exclusive items include: - The Mad Scientist agent figure and card - The Comedian agent figure and card - The Hybrid agent figure and card - The Puppet agent figure and card - Suzanne Taylor Gentleman figure and dashboard - Colonel Steel Gentleman figure and dashboard - Agent cards for all six Gentlemen - All game cards in two versions - regular, and golden foil Also included are two extras - a set of Full Body Gentlemen figures, which are used in place of the normal Gentlemen busts, and a set of 24 extra beautifully-sculpted Ether Counters for use as replacement parts. This set contains many items not available in the retail version!

Kickstarter Edition in shrink with KS exclusives plus add-on 24 sculptured Ether Counters.
